entry.title: OlÃ¡ Octopress
entry.content:
dnf install ruby rubygems ruby-devel rake git

git clone git://github.com/imathis/octopress.git octopress

cd octopress

gem install RedCloth -v ‘4.2.9’

gem install bundler

bundle install

rake install

rake setup_github_pages

informar seu github git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git

git@github.com:username/fabiolrodriguez.github.io.git
